name: VWAP Fractal Intraday Mean-Reversion Crypto
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for highly-liquid crypto pairs that fades short-term divergences from a VWAP-based fractal envelope on 5-minute bars. Long entries occur when price closes 0.5 % below the lower fractal band with volume above its 20-period MA; shorts when price closes 0.5 % above the upper band with the same volume confirmation. Positions are exited at the central VWAP line or after 30 minutes, whichever comes first. Hard protective stops (-0.75 %) and profit targets (+1.25 %) are attached on entry. Position size is limited so that maximum capital at risk per trade does not exceed 2 % of portfolio equity.
